document_data.name: Tatyanna Elfsdottir
document_data.mainbody: '''Tatyanna Elfsdottir''' was a [[cleric]] from the city of [[Ravens Bluff]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In [[Marpenoth]] of the {{YearlinkName|1371}},{{LCRB}}, the Leylandâ€“Nightstalker wedding took place. Dame [[Jenilynn Leyland]], a [[Knight]] of the [[Right Hand of Tyr]], and Sir [[Sarren Nightstalker]], a [[Knight of the Griffon]], were united in a social gala that was reported on the pages of the ''[[Ravens Bluff Trumpeter]]''. The ceremony was officiated by a fellow adventurer and a priest named Tatyanna Elfsdottir. It was reported that the wedding was scheduled for an earlier date, but Jenilynn Leyland was delayed by her mission to the [[Beastlands (plane)|Beastlands]] and being transformed into a [[unicorn]].
